alert.note: Alert for Coastal Georgetown; Florence; Inland Georgetown; Marion; Williamsburg (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wilmington (Northeastern South Carolina and Southeastern North Carolina - Wilmington)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 06 at 10:01PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Florence, Georgetown, southwestern Marion and Williamsburg Counties through 1100 PM EDT... At 1001 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Trio, or 13 miles south of Kingstree, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Georgetown, Lake City, DeBordieu Colony, Kingstree, Pawleys Island, Yawkey South Island, Murrells Inlet, Winyah Bay Entrance, Andrews, Johnsonville, Hemingway, North Santee, Rhems, Cades, Oatland, Poston, Nesmith, Indiantown, Sampit and Plantersville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Georgetown; Florence; Inland Georgetown; Marion; Williamsburg
